title: Personalized Music Education Recommendation Algorithm Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service/in-service teachers to learn how to design intelligent recommendation systems optimized for music education, emphasizing solutions implementable in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: One can apply Hidden Semantic Models (HSM) for learner preference analysis and music content feature extraction.
One can explain how to solve the cold start problem in music recommendation systems using DBN-DNN-based recommendation algorithms
One can design evaluation metrics tailored to musical educational contexts and analyze recommendation system performance

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
